description: Thanks for this great activity tracker! It works well on my OnePlus 6 with Mobian. The graphs give good feedback after a workout and the voice annauncements are great to compare speed with previous runs without the need to look at the phone.

This app has a beautiful icon and layout! Unfortunately it doesn't respect any theming in phosh, neither libadwaita or legacy/GTK3 dark. Can't use on my PPP: Can't stop a timer after you start it, and the timer doesn't increment. Needs to check if the user even has their modem turned on, and handle accordingly, if the app is trying to use GPS. Hoping this gets some PP/PPP support!
summary: Not great for PinePhones, but looks promising
